Text: Jack was promoted to Instructor at Mount Sinai.
Ricardo and Katia have been promoted to Instructor at RUSH University, Chicago.
Giulietta was promoted to Research Assistant Professor at NYU.
Jack awarded 2021 ADRC  Developmental Project Funding for 2 years for his proposal: “Assessing the genetic contribution of RNA editing within myeloid cells to Alzheimer’s disease”
Visiting student from Japan Tatushiko Naito has joined the lab for a short project.
Mikaela has joined the lab for her PhD!
Jack was awarded the AD/PD 2021 Junior Faculty Award for his abstract "An Atlas of Genetic Regulatory Effects on the Transcriptome of Human Microglia”
Gijsje was selected as a recipient for a 2021 Society of Biological Psychiatry International Travel Fellowship Award for the annual meeting of the Society of Biological Psychiatry (SOBP)
Elisa has started her new position as a professor at the Complutense University of Madrid
Oriol has joined the lab as a Post-doctoral Fellow.

Evan started his Ph.D in the neuroscience track at the Graduate School of Biomedical sciences at Mayo Clinic in Florida.
Ricardo was selected as a Postdoctoral Finalist for the 2020 ASHG/Charles J. Epstein Award for Excellence in Human Genetics Research.
Katia was selected as a Postdoctoral SemiFinalist for the 2020 ASHG/Charles J. Epstein Award for Excellence in Human Genetics Research.
Brian was accepted to the Clinical Medical Research PhD program at Imperial College London and awarded the UKDRI at Imperial Distinguished Studentship. Way to go, Brian!
